item.title: Movie Quoteâ€¦
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: "He's a fountain of misplaced rage. Name your cliche; Mother held him too much or not enough, last picked at kickball, late night sneaky uncle, whatever. Now he's so angry that moments of levity actually cause him pain; give him headaches. Happiness, for that gentleman, hurts."
